HELP_PAGE.TITLE: Settings & Help
HELP_PAGE.CONTENT:
The app has been tested with:

  • Google Chrome for Android and iOS
  • Firefox for Android and iOS
  • Desktop-Versions of Chrome and Firefox
There is no guarantee that it works on other Browsers! If you tested it on any other browser and encounter problems, let me know: moin@frot.io

ADD_TO_HOMESCREEN.TITLE: Offline Support
ADD_TO_HOMESCREEN.CONTENT: You can add this application to your homescreen on mobile devices (see below for instructions). It should then also work offline. To add it to your homescreen, your connection should be stable (e.g. Wifi).

CHROME.TITLE: Chrome on Android
CHROME.STEP1: Click on "Add Ramstein to Home Screen"
CHROME.DISMISSED: If you don't see the button or dismissed it, go to chrome://flags/#bypass-app-banner-engagement-checks, click "Enable" and then "Relaunch"
CHROME.STEP4: You can now access the app from your app drawer

FIREFOX.TITLE: Firefox on Android
FIREFOX.STEP1: Click on "Go to Website" when the notification about Adding to homescreen is shown
FIREFOX.STEP2: Click on the House-with-a-Plus-Symbol at the top and then on "Add to Homescreen"
FIREFOX.STEP4: You can now access the app from your homescreen

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Push-Notifications
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS.CONTENT:
On the first startup, a dialog box at the bottom asks you for enabling push-notifications. If you accidentally clicked 'Deny', you can re-enable them with:

  1. If you use a browser: Click on the lock left of the URL and set 'Notification' to 'Ask'.
  2. If you installed the app: Go to the app settings of your Operating System (Android or iOS) and re-enable Notifications.
  3. Click the button below.

LANGUAGE_SELECT.TITLE: Language
LANGUAGE_SELECT.CONTENT: You can switch the language with the buttons below. Labels instead of country flags are used on the buttons. Please note, that not everything could be translated to English.

APP_UPDATE.TITLE: App Update
APP_UPDATE.CONTENT: Here you can manually search for a new version of the app. This happens every 6 hours automatically. In case there is an update available, a notification is shown.

RESET.TITLE: Reset
RESET.CONTENT: Here you can reset the app completely. Please be aware that this also deletes all favorites.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Feedback
FEEDBACK.CONTENT:
For Bugs, Feature-requests or praise, write me an Email: moin@frot.io

Please do not forget to include your Operating System (Android, MacOS, Windows, iOS...) and the Browser you are using.

NOT_SUPPORTED.TEXT: Push Notifications are not supported by this browser.

ERROR.TEXT: There was an error enabling Push Notifications!

UPDATE_DIALOG.AVAILABLE: Update available! Please update once you have a stable connection.
